title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: C.B.", 1930–45
medium: Brush and black ink, pen and blue ink on cream illustration board
markings: On verso, a Canson and Montgolfier label.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: C.B.; upper right corner: 731; right of monogram: 26 m/m; upper left: 430; verso, center: Puiforcat.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Trefoil-shaped monogram comprised of a black "C" outlined in blue conjoined with two similarly shaped elements drawn at different angles to form a "B".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: C.B.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Brush and black ink, pen and blue ink on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-79.
